mapper.update: UPDATE qfy_family_member a,qfy_family_member_temp b SET a.name = b.name, a.family_rel = b.family_rel, a.telephone = b.telephone, a.s1 = b.s1, a.s2 = b.s2, a.s3 = b.s3, a.s4 = b.s4, a.s5 = b.s5, a.s6 = b.s6, a.s7 = b.s7, a.s8 = b.s8, a.s9 = b.s9, a.s10 = b.s10, a.town_yiliao = b.town_yiliao, a.town_yanglao = b.town_yanglao, a.town_min_baozheng = b.town_min_baozheng, a.city_yiliao = b.city_yiliao, a.city_yanglao = b.city_yanglao, a.working_address = b.working_address, a.in_school = b.in_school, a.dabing_yiliao = b.dabing_yiliao, a.disability = b.disability, a.enlist = b.enlist, a.health = b.health, a.labor_skills = b.labor_skills, a.logout_date = b.logout_date, a.marriage = b.marriage, a.min_baozheng_date = b.min_baozheng_date, a.min_baozheng_level = b.min_baozheng_level, a.move_out = b.move_out, a.nation = b.nation, a.register_date = b.register_date, a.support_date = b.support_date, a.support_member = b.support_member, a.wenhua_cc = b.wenhua_cc, a.working_date = a.working_date, a.working_depart = b.working_depart, a.zhengzhi_mm = b.zhengzhi_mm, a.update_time = now(), a.update_by = #{username} WHERE a.family_number = b.family_number AND a.year = b.year AND a.id_card = b.id_card AND b.create_by = #{username}
